styles.description: Vertical layout with top title section, central metrics display, and bottom action items
styles.layoutDetails: Title at top, main content in center with large numbers/metrics, supporting info at bottom
styles.useCase: Best for stories with quantitative metrics and measurable outcomes

styles.description: Grid-based layout with multiple sections showing different aspects
styles.layoutDetails: Multi-column grid with distinct sections, each highlighting different metrics or achievements
styles.useCase: Best for stories with multiple key points or comparative metrics

styles.description: Circular/radial layout with central focus and radiating elements
styles.layoutDetails: Central element with radiating sections or circular progress indicators
styles.useCase: Best for stories with percentage-based metrics or central theme with supporting elements

styles.description: Timeline or process flow layout showing sequential steps
styles.layoutDetails: Left-to-right or top-to-bottom flow showing process steps or timeline
styles.useCase: Best for stories showing a process, journey, or sequential achievements

styles.description: Hero layout with large title and prominent visual elements
styles.layoutDetails: Large title section at top, prominent central visual, supporting metrics below
styles.useCase: Best for high-impact stories that need strong visual presence

styles.description: Minimalist layout with clean spacing and focused content
styles.layoutDetails: Clean design with ample white space, focused on key message
styles.useCase: Best for stories with clear, focused messages that don't need complex visuals

styles.description: Dashboard-style layout with multiple data points and charts
styles.layoutDetails: Multiple charts, graphs, and data visualizations in organized sections
styles.useCase: Best for stories with extensive data or multiple metrics to display

styles.description: Infographic-style with icons and visual storytelling
styles.layoutDetails: Icon-heavy design with visual storytelling elements and narrative flow
styles.useCase: Best for stories that benefit from visual storytelling and icon-based communication

styles.description: Balanced layout with equal emphasis on multiple elements
styles.layoutDetails: Even distribution of visual elements with balanced composition
styles.useCase: Best for stories with multiple equally important points or balanced narratives
